name: Square-1234
description:
Note : This game is in development. The download link below is the Demo version of the game.

The numbers on each square represents the amount of times you have to go through it.

Once all the squares are empty, the level will be complete, however, if you step on a square, that already is empty, the game will be over.

The game is played with arrow keys.

There can be more than 1 solution. (usually a lot)

For the people who doesn't know how to start the game : Press 1 on the keyboard or click the number 1 on the screen.

There are 20 levels available.
